overview.tax_residency_rules: Determined by permanent residence and economic ties.

personal_income_tax.social_security: 9.75% of salary (shared between employer and employee).

corporate_tax.deductions: Standard deductions and expenses related to business activities.

capital_gains_tax.exemptions: Gains from the sale of personal assets and real estate held for more than two years are exempt.

vat_gst.exemptions: Healthcare, education, and certain basic necessities.

property_tax.rate: Property tax rates vary depending on the municipality and property value.
property_tax.exemptions: Primary residence and property owned by pensioners.
property_tax.additional_notes: Property tax rates range from 0.5% to 1.5%.

digital_nomad_visa.requirements: Must work remotely for an employer or business outside of Panama and earn a minimum monthly income of $3,000.

special_economic_zones.name: Colón Free Trade Zone
special_economic_zones.tax_incentives: Duty-free imports and exports, reduced corporate tax rates.
special_economic_zones.setup_requirements: Registration and approval by the Colón Free Trade Zone Authority.

special_economic_zones.name: Panama Pacifico Special Economic Area
special_economic_zones.tax_incentives: 15% corporate tax rate, reduced property taxes.
special_economic_zones.setup_requirements: Registration and approval by the Panama Pacifico Authority.

double_taxation_agreements.description: Avoids double taxation on income and capital gains.
Avoids double taxation on income and capital gains.

crypto_tax.income_tax_rate: Income from crypto activities is taxed as regular income.
crypto_tax.capital_gains_rate: Capital gains from crypto assets are taxed at a rate of 10%.
crypto_tax.mining_tax: Crypto mining is considered a business activity and is taxed accordingly.

nft_tax.income_tax_rate: Income from NFT sales is taxed as regular income.
nft_tax.capital_gains_rate: Capital gains from NFT sales are taxed at a rate of 10%.

additional_notes.political_risks: Panama has a stable political environment, but the global political climate may impact economic stability.
additional_notes.economic_stability: Panama has a strong economy with low inflation and a stable currency (pegged to the US Dollar).
additional_notes.legal_system: Panama has a well-developed legal system, but the judicial process can be slow.
additional_notes.ease_of_doing_business: Panama is ranked 42nd in the World Bank's Ease of Doing Business Index.
